docs.snippet: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton's lead over Republican rival Donald Trump narrowed to less than 3 percentage points, according to a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll released on Friday, down from nearly eight points on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton's lead over Republican rival Donald Trump narrowed to less than 3 percentage points, according to a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll released on Friday, down from nearly eight points on Monday.

headline.main: Clinton's Lead Over Trump Narrows to Less Than Three Points: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Clinton's Lead Over Trump Narrows to Less Than Three Points: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump, who had caused a rift by withholding support for Mr. Ryan, also called for the re-election of Senator Kelly Ayotte as he sought to move past a tumultuous week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump, who had caused a rift by withholding support for Mr. Ryan, also called for the re-election of Senator Kelly Ayotte as he sought to move past a tumultuous week.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump endorses re-elections of House Speaker Paul D Ryan and Sens John McCain and Kelly Ayotte as he seeks to move past tumultuous week touched off by his feud with Muslim-American parents of slain soldier; Trump's campaign staff hopes that endorsements will help unite Republican Party.

headline.main: Donald Trump Endorses Paul Ryan and John McCain in Bid for G.O.P. Unity
headline.print_headline: Trump Endorses  Ryan and McCain in Bid for Unity

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Milwaukee.

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton doesn't appear all that interested in making scenic stops on her state-to-state quest to become president. The Democratic nominee is instead programming her GPS to take her on the quickest route to collect the 270 Electoral College...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton doesn't appear all that interested in making scenic stops on her state-to-state quest to become president. The Democratic nominee is instead programming her GPS to take her on the quickest route to collect the 270 Electoral College votes she needs to win the White House.

headline.main: Charting a Road to 270, Clinton Sets Out Most Efficient Path
headline.print_headline: Charting a Road to 270, Clinton Sets Out Most Efficient Path

docs.snippet: How Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of a soldier killed in Iraq, came to challenge Donald J. Trump and reshape a presidential campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: How Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of a soldier killed in Iraq, came to challenge Donald J. Trump and reshape a presidential campaign.
docs.abstract: Profiles of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of late American soldier Humayun Khan who criticized Donald J Trump's position on Muslims during Democratic National Convention, effectively reshaping presidential campaign; Kahns have become public figures overnight, wreaking havoc on their simple way of life as Americans.

headline.main: Moment in Convention Glare Shakes Up Khans’ American Life
headline.print_headline: Moment in Convention Glare  Stirs Parents’ American Life

byline.contributor: Salman Masood and Jackson Landers contributed reporting. Susan Beachy and Jack Begg contributed research.
byline.original: By N. R. KLEINFIELD, RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and MELISSA EDDY

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti acknowledged Saturday that the results of November's U.S. presidential election could weigh heavily on his city's chances of hosting the 2024 Olympics, saying that a victory by Donald Trump could turn off IOC voters...
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti acknowledged Saturday that the results of November's U.S. presidential election could weigh heavily on his city's chances of hosting the 2024 Olympics, saying that a victory by Donald Trump could turn off IOC voters.

headline.main: LA Mayor: Trump Victory Could Turn Off IOC Voters to '24 Bid
headline.print_headline: LA Mayor: Trump Victory Could Turn Off IOC Voters to '24 Bid

docs.snippet: Endangered Sen. Pat Toomey is banking on Pennsylvania voters backing him in November even if they oppose fellow Republican Donald Trump, a ticket-splitting strategy that may help determine whether the GOP can hang on to its Senate majority this el...
docs.lead_paragraph: Endangered Sen. Pat Toomey is banking on Pennsylvania voters backing him in November even if they oppose fellow Republican Donald Trump, a ticket-splitting strategy that may help determine whether the GOP can hang on to its Senate majority this election year.

headline.main: GOP Sen. Toomey Banking on Split-Ticket Voting in Pa. Race
headline.print_headline: GOP Sen. Toomey Banking on Split-Ticket Voting in Pa. Race

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's running mate Mike Pence is campaigning in southern Indiana and Ohio, including a stop at a well-known Cincinnati chili parlor....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's running mate Mike Pence is campaigning in southern Indiana and Ohio, including a stop at a well-known Cincinnati chili parlor.

headline.main: Pence Stops by Chili Parlor as Part of Indiana, Ohio Tour
headline.print_headline: Pence Stops by Chili Parlor as Part of Indiana, Ohio Tour

docs.snippet: A Roger Ailes lookalike smoothed the way for Triumph, the Comic Insult Dog, at the Republican National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Roger Ailes lookalike smoothed the way for Triumph, the Comic Insult Dog, at the Republican National Convention.

headline.main: Insult Dog Triumph, Fake Roger Ailes Star in Hulu Special
headline.print_headline: Insult Dog Triumph, Fake Roger Ailes Star in Hulu Special

docs.snippet: Robin Starck is a retired submarine commander who still lives in the shadow of America's largest naval base, and he's heard all the shouting about Donald Trump and his tangle with the parents of a U.S. Army officer killed in Iraq....
docs.lead_paragraph: Robin Starck is a retired submarine commander who still lives in the shadow of America's largest naval base, and he's heard all the shouting about Donald Trump and his tangle with the parents of a U.S. Army officer killed in Iraq.

headline.main: Military Community Split Over Trump's Feud With Khans
headline.print_headline: Military Community Split Over Trump's Feud With Khans

docs.snippet: The president headed into his two-week break in an unusually festive mood, having just celebrated his 55th birthday and with Hillary Clinton ahead in the polls....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president headed into his two-week break in an unusually festive mood, having just celebrated his 55th birthday and with Hillary Clinton ahead in the polls.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama begins his last summer vacation with his family as president in Martha's Vineyard, where he is expected to spend his time reading and playing golf.

headline.main: Obama Arrives in Martha’s Vineyard for Two-Week Vacation
headline.print_headline: A Final Summer Vacation in Office for Obama
